name: rivalry
caption: Rivalry

effect.short: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.
effect.full:
This Pokémon inflicts 1.25× as much [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage} against Pokémon of the same gender and 0.75× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the opposite gender.

If either Pokémon is genderless, damage is unaffected.

flavorText:
Becomes competitive and deals more damage to
Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to
Pokémon of the opposite gender.
